option: Dumps the contents of the target program executable file as text on standard output, instead of analysing the program. The form and content of the dump depends on the format of the executable file (e.g. ELF or COFF) and on the target processor. This option disables the analysis, so there should be no root subprogram names on the command-line after the name of the target program executable file. Moreover, the option should not be used together with .
